action.name: download
action.param: This document is generated by ARCS SharedToken Portability Service and signed with a federation-trusted certificate. The ownership of the document is guaranteed by the request of Shibboleth authentication to the service. The document is used when a user is transfered from one institution to another institution within the federation. The user will be asked to present the document to the new institution admin when he/she is registered to the institution. The admin will verify the signature with the PDF Reader and then populate the SharedToken to the repository.
